key.name: user-agent
key.description: The value of User-Agent header to use when communicating with the MMS server.

key.name: user-agent-profile
key.description: The value of x-wap-profile header to use when communicating with the MMS server.

key.name: max-message-size
key.summary: Maximum size of an outbound MMS message.
key.description: Maximum size of an outbound MMS message.

key.name: max-pixels
key.summary: Maximum number of pixels in an outbound image.
key.description: Maximum number of pixels in an outbound image.

key.name: allow-delivery-reports
key.description: Whether or not we (as a recipient) allow sending delivery reports.
